name: auto_approve_tool_calls
path_to_scripting: This JSON file defines a boolean flag that controls whether the agent automatically approves tool calls. It is not directly scriptable, but its `value` is read by the agent's main control loop. If `true`, the agent will execute tool calls without explicit user confirmation. If `false`, the agent will prompt the user for approval before executing a tool call. This is a crucial configuration for managing the agent's autonomy and user interaction.
